meanings.definition: A type of vehicle used for grooming ski slopes.
meanings.sent1: The snowcats worked hard to smooth out the ski slopes.
meanings.sent2: The resort invested in new snowcats to maintain the ski slopes.
meanings.sent3: The snowcats had a race to see who could groom the slopes faster.
meanings.sent4: The snowcats moved gracefully across the snow like giant mechanical cats.
meanings.sent5: The loud purring of the snowcats could be heard from afar as they worked.

meanings.definition: Plural form of snowcat, referring to multiple vehicles used for grooming ski slopes.
meanings.sent1: The fleet of snowcats lined up to start their grooming duties.
meanings.sent2: The snowcats were essential for maintaining the ski resort's slopes.
meanings.sent3: The snowcats gathered for a group photo before heading out to work.
meanings.sent4: The snowcats roared to life, ready to sculpt the snow into perfection.
meanings.sent5: The synchronized movements of the snowcats were mesmerizing to watch.
